name: io.bentonow.bento-mcp
description: Email marketing and analytics tooling for AI assistants via Bento.
long_description: Provides secure MCP access to Bento so assistants can inspect subscribers, broadcasts, automations, sequences, workflows, and email templates without leaving chat.

publishable_key.title: Bento Publishable Key
publishable_key.description: Find this in the Bento dashboard under Integrations â†’ API Keys.

secret_key.title: Bento Secret Key
secret_key.description: Secret API key for server-to-server calls. Keep this private.

site_uuid.title: Bento Site UUID
site_uuid.description: Site identifier (e.g., site_123) that scopes all API calls.

tools.name: get_subscriber
tools.description: Look up a Bento subscriber by email or UUID.

tools.name: batch_import_subscribers
tools.description: Import or update subscribers in bulk with custom fields and tags.

tools.name: list_tags
tools.description: List all tags in the Bento site.

tools.name: create_field
tools.description: Create a custom field by key.

tools.name: track_event
tools.description: Track custom or purchase events for a subscriber.

tools.name: get_site_stats
tools.description: Retrieve aggregate stats for the Bento site.

tools.name: list_automations
tools.description: List sequences and/or workflows with optional pagination.

tools.name: list_workflows
tools.description: List workflows and their email templates.

tools.name: list_sequences
tools.description: List email sequences and their templates.

tools.name: create_sequence_email
tools.description: Append an email template to a sequence by ID or name.

tools.name: get_email_template
tools.description: Fetch an email template by ID.

tools.name: update_email_template
tools.description: Update a template's subject or HTML content.
